Title: A Protector of Magic
Description:
I am very curious about Haleh--she is one of the last living consorts of Malygos. I am grateful for her going to Malygos in his time of need.

I will admit, I have spent some time spying on her. She is a blue dragon through and through. Studious, proud, and one of the more careful ones around magic. 

I do feel most suited to be the one to visit her about the call of the Isles. Take my portal when you are ready. I shall meet you there.
ObjectivesText: Find Haleh in Winterspring in Kalimdor.

Objectives.Text: Use the portal to go to Winterspring
